text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff... All right, that'sten laps.
choice_data_list:
Then we've finished this morning's training.
Good job.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Aw c'mon, that was barely a<n>warm-up. I feel like I could do
ten<n>more!
choice_data_list: But we've got training in the afternoon too...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're in the middle of the summer<n>training program, right
when racers<n>start to get worn out. The blazing sun<n>and
white-hot sand don't help with<n>the exhaustion.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But I'm so close to breakin' my old<n>records. If I don't push
through,<n>How'm I s'posed to forge my body<n>into a racin'
machine?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I wanna go all out today!
choice_data_list:
Okay, but let's ramp up our routine one lap at a
time.

Okay, but let's ramp up our routine one lap at a
time.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Works for me! 'Kay, be right back!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looks like Tamamo Cross is feeling<n>extra motivated today.
With that in<n>mind, I lead her through an extra<n>intense
afternoon training session.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, there ya are! Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hey, wanna check out the nearby<n>festival? You're free right
now, yeah?
choice_data_list: Yup!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Awesome. Actually, I was thinkin' I'd<n>give that whole
treatin' yaself thing<n>another try.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I worked my butt off today,<n>didn't I? That regimen
of yours was<n>enough for two days... So you know...
choice_data_list: Exactly, you deserve a reward!
Exactly, you deserve a reward!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah! I mean, if you say so, then<n>that settles it. I'm
treatin' myself!
choice_data_list: So what would you like?
So what would you like?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I wanna walk around and stuff my<n>face with festival food!
I've wanted to<n>do that ever since I was a kid! Those<n>stalls
better watch out, 'cause here I<n>come!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hmmm what to get... It all looks so<n>good!

text_block_list.name: Festival Man
text_block_list.text:
Chocolate bananas! Get your<n>chocolate bananas here!
Special deal!<n>Win a game of rock, paper, scissors<n>and get
a second one for free!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Chocolate bananas! That sounds<n>pretty good, but maybe I
should get<n>somethin' with more substance...
choice_data_list: What happened to stuffing your face?
What happened to stuffing your face?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Right, but... shouldn't I spend my<n>money more... wisely?
choice_data_list: Then could you go buy me one?
Then could you go buy me one?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Ah, you suck at rock, paper,<n>scissors, huh? All right,
leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'll take one chocolate banana,<n>please!

text_block_list.name: Festival Man
text_block_list.text: Comin' right up! But before that...<n>rock, paper...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Scissors!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I won! I got you two chocolate<n>bananas, Trainer!
choice_data_list: You won, so I think you deserve the other one.
You won, so I think you deserve the other one.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah... Guess that's only fair...<n>Thanks.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hm? Whoa! Lookit, they've got<n>doteyaki!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
White miso paste?! No way, most<n>joints in and around
Tokyo use the<n>mixed stuff or soy sauce... We gotta<n>eat
here!

text_block_list.name: Festival Woman
text_block_list.text:
Dis girl gets it! Dis here's the real<n>deal! How'd ya like a
little snack,<n>kiddo?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, my dad's always eatin' stuff<n>like this... Hey, wait,
who're ya callin'<n>kiddo?!

text_block_list.name: Festival Woman
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I thought ya were in elementary<n>school. My bad, my bad.
How 'bout a<n>bowl on da house?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
What? Really?! Ah, then how 'bout ya<n>gimme two, and I'll
pay ya half price?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Mmm... These beef tendons meltin' in<n>my mouth... The
subtle sweetness of<n>the miso paste... I'm in paradise!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Now this is a worthwhilepurchase! Two doteyaki for the priceof one! Feels like I'm back home!
choice_data_list:
I'll take a bowl of simmered beef tendon,
please.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, nice choice! If I'm vouchin'<n>for this place's
authenticity, ya know<n>it's good!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Next up is... takoyaki! You want<n>some?
choice_data_list:
I don't know if I could eat a whole order by
myself...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Then let's split one!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After receiving our order of takoyaki,<n>we both dig in.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Where's the octopus? This<n>takoyaki's all dough.
choice_data_list: Yup. It's festival takoyaki, all right.
Yup. It's festival takoyaki, all right.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I guess you weren't expectin'<n>much either, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, I never got it before. Why<n>would people buy
takoyaki at festivals<n>when legit takoyaki joints are much<n>
better?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I think I get it now. It's the<n>atmosphere, right? It adds this
extra<n>flavor you can't get anywhere else.
choice_data_list: I think you're right.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Right? But ya know, if I hadn't tried<n>these takoyaki, I
woulda kept on<n>wonderin' that for the rest of my life.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Guess the same goes for treatin'<n>myself too.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That's the point of these little treats,<n>right? Sometimes you
need a little<n>break if you wanna go even higher.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Tamamo Cross looks up to the sky<n>as she continues.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ya know what I thought after eatin'<n>pancakes with ya? "I
wanna eat 'em<n>again."

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Pancake mix's always been enough<n>for me, but now? It's
like that cafe's<n>pancakes are a goal for me to reach.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But I gotta work hard if I wanna eat<n>'em, right? So this
whole treatin'<n>myself business works as motivation<n>too!
choice_data_list: Y-yeah, I suppose so.
Y-yeah, I suppose so.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
All I wanted was to see her reward<n>herself more often, but it
seems she's<n>taken it as a way to improve herself.<n>That's
Tamamo Cross for you.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
And ya know what? Now I know<n>'bout all sorts of tasty
things! Things I<n>can show my family!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Maybe next time... I'll be able toactually buy my parents an anniversary gift myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I think back to the day we went<n>shopping. Tamamo Cross
was so<n>overwhelmed by the prices that she<n>actually ran
away, so I picked<n>something out for her.
choice_data_list: You just need more experience!
You just need more experience!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Exactly! Which is why I gotta keep<n>givin' myself treats
every once in a<n>while. I'll be countin' on your help,<n>
Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but no expensive chocolates,<n>please. Just walkin'
'round and<n>eatin' street food is luxurious enough<n>for me.
choice_data_list:
You didn't actually spend that much money
though.

You didn't actually spend that much money
though.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Of course I didn't! Ya think dis proudNaniwa racer would ever pay askin'price for somethin'?! I'm not touchin' it unless I know it's a steal!
choice_data_list: Yeah, hometown pride!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You got that right! And that pride is<n>what's gonna take me
to the top, with<n>pit stops for treats along the way!
